member.name: P:Plugin.DeviceInfo.CrossDeviceInfo.IsSupported
member.summary: Gets if the plugin is supported on the current platform.

member.name: P:Plugin.DeviceInfo.DeviceInfoImplementation.Manufacturer
member.summary: Get the name of the device

member.name: P:Plugin.DeviceInfo.DeviceInfoImplementation.DeviceName
member.summary: Get the name of the device

member.name: P:Plugin.DeviceInfo.DeviceInfoImplementation.AppVersion
member.summary: Returns the current version of the app, as defined in the PList, e.g. "4.3".

member.name: P:Plugin.DeviceInfo.DeviceInfoImplementation.AppBuild
member.summary: Returns the current build of the app, as defined in the PList, e.g. "4300".

member.name: P:Plugin.DeviceInfo.DeviceInfoImplementation.IsDevice
member.summary:
Checks whether this is a real device or an emulator/simulator
Source: http://igrali.com/2014/07/17/get-device-information-windows-phone-8-1-winrt/
